import { useState } from "react" import { ArrowComp } from "../assets/ArrowComp" import '../assets/caret--left.svg' import logo from '../assets/monchev-logo.png' import { HatIcon } from "../assets/icons/hat" import { menuItems } from "../assets/util" import { iconSetter } from "../assets/icons/icons-library" export const Sidebar = () => { const [open, setOpen] = useState(true) const icons = iconSetter() const menuListItems = menuItems() console.log(menuListItems) console.log(icons) const onToggleClick = () => { setOpen(!open) } return (
{/* Arrow icon */}
{/* Menu */}

MONCHEV-DESIGN

    {menuListItems.map((menu, index) => (
  • {menu.icon} {menu.title}
    • ))}
SOCIALS

HomePage

) }
